hangle: 이제 네가 가고 싶은 곳이 있다면 떠나도 좋다,
first_translate: if there’s somewhere you want to go now, feel free to leave at any time,
fiona.
now that you’re officially an adult,

hangle: 원하는 게 있다면 자유롭게 할 수 있어.
first_translate: you can do whatever your heart desires.

hangle: 네 마법 실력이라면 수도에서 부귀영화를 누릴 수도 있을 테고.
first_translate: with your skills as a magician, I’m sure you could even live in luxury and wealth if you wanted to.

hangle: …사생아인 게 신경쓰이면 헤일론의 이름으로 후견인을 해 주마.
first_translate: and if being illegitimate bothers you so much, then I’ll become your guardian under house haylon.

hangle: 그러면 수도에서도 널 함부로 대하지는 못할 거다.
first_translate: that way no one will dare treat you poorly when you get to the capital either.
wow... this is quite unexpected.
what is?

hangle: 공작님이 이런 친절한 제안을 해 주시다니…
first_translate: I never thought his grace would make such a kind offer like this...

hangle: 나는 그저 네게 마땅한 대가를 지불할 뿐이다만.
first_translate: it's just my way of repaying what I owe you for all these years.
but didn’t he already pay me back by giving me money every month?
didn’t he already pay me back by giving me money every month?

hangle: 그건 단순히 네 노동에 대한 값에 불과해.
first_translate: that was simply payment for your labor.
this has nothing to do with that.

hangle: 아벨이 이런 상냥한 생각을 하고 있었다니…
first_translate: to think abel had been thinking about doing something nice for me all along...

hangle: 그동안 피도 눈물도 없다고 욕해서 미안!
first_translate: sorry for calling him cold-hearted all those times!
and here...
take this.
a letter came from your family home.
my “family home”?
then it must’ve come from house green!
dear father, our youngest child says she wants to volunteer.

hangle: 수줍어서 크게 말은 못 하는 것 같지만.
first_translate: she seems too shy to say anything out loud though.

hangle: 어린 나를 억지로 전쟁터로 등 떠민 장본인들.
first_translate: the people responsible for pushing little ol’ me onto the battlefield against my will...
so they are saying...

hangle: 5년간 편지 한 통 보낸 적이 없더니…
first_translate: they haven’t sent me a single letter over the past five years...
nor have we heard anything from them during that time...
do you know why they might've written to us now?

hangle: 글쎄, 나도 뜯어 보지는 않아서 모르지.
first_translate: no idea since I haven’t opened it yet.
right. well, if you’d like,

hangle: 널 이곳으로 떠민 본가를 부수는 일도 해 주마.
first_translate: I can also help destroy the very family that pushed you away from their home.

hangle: 그동안 캐 놓은 약점이 꽤 많거든.
first_translate: I dug up plenty of dirt on them while you were gone.
is this abel’s own special service or something?

hangle: 그, 그 정도로 복수심에 불타지는 않아요.
first_translate: i-it doesn’t bother me enough to seek revenge.
honestly speaking, I don’t really care anymore.
well, knowing how you are, that makes sense.

hangle: 나라면 힘이 생긴 즉시 먼지 한 톨 남기지 않고 없애버렸겠지만.
first_translate: me? I wouldn’t hesitate to wipe them off the face of earth once I got strong enough.
in any case...

hangle: 확실히 이제 곧 원작이 시작될 시점이구나.
first_translate: it looks like the original story is finally starting soon.
the female lead should appear around this time too.

hangle: 내가 시그렌 곁에 있어 봤자 정신만 사나울지도…
first_translate: maybe it'd only confuse things more if I stayed close to siegren right now anyway...
either way, thank you for everything you offered me today.
if you’re thankful, call me dad.
I'll pass.
cold girl.
haha...
why am I getting upset over this again?
let’s see...
uh... so basically...
they’re asking me to confirm whether I'm dead or not?!
that’s pretty much it.

hangle: 현재, 내 아버지인 그린 백작이 위독하다.
first_translate: apparently, my father, count green, isn’t doing well.

hangle: 때문에 유산과 관련된 일을 처리해야 하니,
first_translate: for that reason, they need to sort some matters related to inheritance,

hangle: 그린 가문의 혈육인 피오나의 사망을 확인하는 문서를 보내 달라-
first_translate: which requires documents confirming the death of fiona, blood relative of house green--

hangle: 애초에 살아있다는 생각은 하지도 않은 모양이군.
first_translate: looks like they never expected me to still be alive.

hangle: 이미 5년 전에 죽으라고 사지로 내보낸 집안의 천덕꾸러기였다.
first_translate: after all, I was the good-for-nothing daughter whom they forced to join the war five years ago.

hangle: 줄곧 잊고 있다 유산 문제를 처리할 때가 되어서야 생각이 났겠지.
first_translate: they probably forgot about me until it became necessary to deal with issues regarding the estate.
house green hasn’t changed one bit.

hangle: 그린 가문의 유산에는 눈곱만큼도 관심 없어.
first_translate: I couldn’t care less about inheriting anything from them.

hangle: 아버지인 그린 백작의 임종을 지킬 의리도 없고.
first_translate: not to mention, I have zero interest in seeing my dying father.
still...

hangle: 하필 아벨이 하고 싶은걸 하며 살라고 할 때쯤 일이 터지다니.
first_translate: of all the timing, this happened exactly when abel told me I could start living however I liked.

hangle: 나중에 내가 살아 있다는 걸 알고 나면 성가지게 굴겠지.
first_translate: when they find out later that I’m actually alive, they’ll freak out.

hangle: 일단 그린 가의 호적에 올라가 있으니
first_translate: as long as I remain registered as part of house green,
unless I send confirmation of my death,

hangle: 내가 살아 있다는 걸 알게 될 거고.
first_translate: they’ll eventually figure out that I survived.

hangle: 그냥 상속 포기 각서에 먼저 사인을 할까?
first_translate: should I sign papers renouncing my claim to the inheritance first?

hangle: 아벨이 복수해도 된다고 했지만 구태여 그러고 싶진 않다.
first_translate: abel said I could take revenge if I wanted to, but I don’t wish to do that.

hangle: 5년 전의 일로 감정을 쏟고 싶지 않아.
first_translate: I don’t want to waste my emotions on events from five years ago.

hangle: 엄연한 귀족인 그들을 직접적으로 죽이거나 큰 상해를 줘도 안돼.
first_translate: on top of that, I shouldn’t kill or seriously harm nobles directly unless I want to end up behind bars myself.
on top of that, I shouldn’t kill or seriously harm nobles directly unless I want to end up behind bars myself.
the easiest and most peaceful solution would be...

hangle: 포기 각서에 사인하고 남남이 되는 것.
first_translate: ...signing papers renouncing my claim to the inheritance and cutting ties completely.
but before I can do that, I need to head back home...

hangle: 수도...를 한 번쯤 마음 편히 돌아보고 싶긴 했지.
first_translate: I did always wanna visit the capital without worrying about anything else.
fiona, are you there?
siegren. come in.
no thanks.
I’ll talk to you from here instead.
really?

hangle: 몇 년 전만 해도 침대 위에서 같이 이야기를 할 만큼 친했는데…
first_translate: we used to chat lying down next to each other just a few years ago...

hangle: 요즘에는 컸다고 이런 식으로 서먹하게 군다니까.
first_translate: yet nowadays, you act awkwardly toward me because you grew older.
I spoke with abel earlier.
call him master.

hangle: 스...승님이 네가 곧 여기를 떠날지도 모른다던데.
first_translate: m-master mentioned that you may be leaving this place soon.
yes, maybe.
where are you going?

hangle: 우선은 아버지가 위독하다는 편지가 와서 수도로 가 보려고.
first_translate: first, I received news that my father is ill, so I plan to return to the capital.

hangle: 그린 가는 중앙 귀족이라 수도에 저택이 있으니까.
first_translate: since house green belongs to central aristocracy, they have a manor there.
so despite having abandoned you, you still consider him your father.

hangle: 굳이 말하자면 부를 호칭이 마땅치 않아선데.
first_translate: if I had to choose, I suppose "father" isn't the best term to use.
are you planning to attend his funeral and come back afterward?
no, I’d rather look around the capital while I’m there.
it won’t hurt after spending so many years in haylon.
then... when will you be coming back?
um...

hangle: 아, 시그렌이 뭘 오해하고 있는지 알겠다.
first_translate: oh, I understand where siegren’s misunderstanding comes from.

hangle: 시그렌, 난 지금으로선 딱히 돌아올 생각이 없어.
first_translate: at present, I don’t intend on returning anytime soon, siegren.
what does that mean?
I’m not gonna come back.
how come?
because I have no reason left to stay here.
exactly.
over the last five years, siegren and I remained great friends,
while sometimes protecting him whenever needed.

hangle: 원작이 시작되는 시점을 코앞에 둔 지금은,
first_translate: now that the beginning of the novel looms near,

hangle: 내가 그를 위해 할 수 있는 일이 거의 없는 셈이다.
first_translate: there aren’t many ways I can continue helping him.
can we talk for a second?
o-okay.
you’re telling me you’re leaving?
yeah.
wait, hold on.

hangle: 어떻게 그걸 한마디 말도 없이 순식간에 결정해?
first_translate: how could you decide this so suddenly without discussing it with me beforehand?

hangle: 공작님이 이제 성인이니 하고 싶은 거 하라고 해서?
first_translate: did duke abel tell you to do whatever you want now that you’re an adult?
abel...
th-that bastard...!!!
use nicer words.
is that all you have to say to me right now?

hangle: 우리가 5년 동안 생사고락을 함께한 사이란 건 잊었어?
first_translate: have you forgotten that we went through thick and thin together for five whole years?
I’m disappointed.
I’ll write letters.
that’s not the problem!
then what is?
all of it.
siegren.

hangle: 설마 우리가 영원히 함께할 거라 생각했던 건 아니지?
first_translate: please tell me you weren’t expecting us to stick together forever.
